tool_description: Extracts and processes existing transit route information including stops, paths, schedules, and service characteristics from transit data feeds.

gtfs_feed_path.description: Path to GTFS (General Transit Feed Specification) data

route_types.description: Filter by transit modes (bus, rail, subway, tram)

service_date.description: Date for which to extract service information

error_messages: Invalid GTFS format: Ensure GTFS feed contains required files (routes.txt, stops.txt, trips.txt, stop_times.txt).
Service date not found: Specified service_date must exist in calendar.txt or calendar_dates.txt.
Unsupported route type: Use valid GTFS route types or [bus, rail, subway, tram].
usage: Provide path to GTFS feed and target service date. Optionally filter by route types. Returns structured route network data for analysis.

stop_locations.description: Flattened array of stop coordinates [lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2, ...]

route_lengths.description: Length of each route in kilometers

service_frequencies.description: Average headway in minutes for each route
